meanings.definition: People who glance quickly or briefly.
meanings.sent1: The glancers at the party kept looking around.
meanings.sent2: The glancers in the crowd hurriedly scanned the room.
meanings.sent3: The glancers at the zoo missed seeing the rare animal.
meanings.sent4: Like shooting stars, the glancers darted their eyes across the room.
meanings.sent5: The glancers were like curious birds, flitting from one thing to another.

meanings.definition: To look quickly or briefly at something.
meanings.sent1: She glancers at the clock to check the time.
meanings.sent2: He glancers at the menu before deciding what to order.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel glancers at the acorn before scampering away.
meanings.sent4: The lightning glancers across the sky before disappearing.
meanings.sent5: The child glancers at the book cover, eager to start reading.
